sentences.en: a cigar clenched between his teeth
sentences.cn: 他叼在嘴里的一支雪茄

sentences.en: Breathe out slowly and then clench your abdomen muscles.
sentences.cn: 将空气缓慢地乎出,然后紧紧地绷住你腹部的肌肉.

sentences.en: From out the past, and make her clench her hands?
sentences.cn: 激起过往的回忆, 令她将双拳紧紧握起?

sentences.en: Happiness seems meteor, who can accompany to me clench it.
sentences.cn: 幸福就像流星, 谁是那个陪我抓住流星的人.

sentences.en: He had to clench his teeth to stop himself from shouting with delight.
sentences.cn: 他咬住牙,不让自己因喜悦而喊出来.

sentences.en: His fists clench and unclench in leashed frustration at his impotence.
sentences.cn: 他的拳头握紧,然后又因为挫败感而松开.

sentences.en: His hands continued to clench and unclench.
sentences.cn: 他的双手反复地攥紧又松开.

sentences.en: I felt my jaws clench and teeth grind together.
sentences.cn: 我感到双颚紧闭,牙齿紧紧咬在一起.

sentences.en: I felt the clench of his hand on my arm.
sentences.cn: 我感觉到他的手牢牢抓住我的胳臂.

sentences.en: I'll try to do it carefully. Please clench your fist.
sentences.cn: 好的,我会非常小心的. 请您握上拳头.

sentences.en: Jody was pacing the sidelines, her fists clenched.
sentences.cn: 乔迪在球场的边线上紧握着拳头来回踱步。

sentences.en: Mike clench his hand with a wrathful spark in his eyes.
sentences.cn: 麦克握紧双手,眼里冒著愤怒的火花.

sentences.en: Patsy had to clench her jaw to suppress her anger.
sentences.cn: 帕奇只得咬紧牙关压住怒气。

sentences.en: Please clench your fist again. You will feel a little pain.
sentences.cn: 请再握一下拳, 我穿刺的时候您会感到有一点痛.

sentences.en: She felt a clench in her stomach as she saw him.
sentences.cn: 当她看到他时,她感到腹部一阵揪紧.

sentences.en: The boxer clinched his opponent; clench a steering wheel.
sentences.cn: 战士们握紧手中的武器; 握紧方向盘.

sentences.en: The person that how will create grandly and read reader clench?
sentences.cn: 盛大如何将创作者和阅读者牢牢抓住?

trans.tran_cn: 牢牢抓住, 钉紧, 敲弯的钉头

trans.tran_en: to hold your hands, teeth etc together tightly, usually because you feel angry or determined

trans.tran_cn: 握紧， 抓牢； 咬紧
